titleStmt.title: Ovid's Art of love with Hero and Leander of Musaeus, from the Greek / translated by several hands.
Ars amatoria. English
titleStmt.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
Musaeus, Grammaticus. Hero and Leander. English.
Hoy, Thomas, 1659-1718? Two essays.

notesStmt.note: Translated into verse by "A well-wisher to the mathematicks" [T.H., i.e. Thomas Hoy]. His translation of 1682 entitled "Two essays". Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
